headline: Realty Income Corporation (O): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Realty Income Corporation on Phaetrix Investing’s Substack by Phaetrix. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on O. Realty Income Corporation’s share was trading at $61.16 as of January 30th. O’s trailing and forward P/E were 58.33 and 37.04 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Realty Income (NYSE: O), […]

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Realty Income (O) Expanding Into Global Logistics With GIC Partnership
summary: Realty Income recently expanded its international footprint by forming a partnership with Singapore’s GIC to commit over US$1.50 billion to build-to-suit logistics real estate and completing its first investment in Mexico, further diversifying its property portfolio. This move not only broadens Realty Income’s reach into higher-growth logistics and Latin American markets, but also underscores its emphasis on using external capital partners to pursue expansion while aiming to preserve...
